channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Freak
channel.description:
#### Another dump post, something else I wasn't going to post
# [color=grey]The Freak - Neutral Offensive[/color]
**Passive: Decaying Body** - Your body is frail and weak but with dark magic, your body will be reformed. You are immune to death at night.
**Passive: Rotten Flesh** - You cannot step up to be King as the Royals at Court will notice your rotting flesh.
**Night Ability 1: Bad Blood** - Select two targets. If one of them has Royal Blood, you will swap it with the other. (3 uses - no self target)
**Night Ability 2: Graverob** - Select a dead target that has Royal Blood and a living target. You will transfer their Royal Blood to the living target. (Infinite uses - can't use on the same dead target twice)
**Day Ability: Demise** - If you are attacked tonight, you will bring them down with you. (2 uses)
**_Goal: See the Blue Dragon's demise._**

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Freak
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Why can’t they become king, balance wise?

It would be simple, they would just become evil king instead of neutral. Only slight change to goal. They wouldn’t normally want to be king though, if NK is alive, so they can win with NK

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Freak
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
yes, but instead of dying after the first day, you come back

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Freak
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
Ah, so you are effectively reaped?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Freak
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
its not revealed is what im saying, but you still couldnt do anything for a day/night

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Freak
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
That’s basically what night immunity does. Your idea confirms them as freak.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Freak
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
Fuck you in your tiny arsehole

Then, class. Class flavour is kinda wonky.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Freak
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
ThePlex:

Passive: Decaying Body - Your body is frail and weak but with dark magic, your body will be reformed. You are immune to death at night.

maybe, make it so you’re “dead” for a day/possibly night, i.e. can’t vote, be targeted (successfully), etc.
But night-immunity piercing abilities still perma-kill you

Read full topic

item.description:
Good thing it’s not a role

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Freak

item.description:
Ohhhhhhhhhhh. An ability that switches Royal Blood? That … is very interesting.
